email-launch.thank: Thank you for booking your Chanel appointment.
email-launch.info: (Your 40 minute appointment will begin when your Emays Stylist arrives).

time-info.message: We’re looking forward to seeing you on:

email-launch.contact-message: we will contact you the day before your appointment, as well as a reminder on the day

special-info.line-one: We look forward to seeing you, but should you be unable to attend then please note our cancellation policy below.
special-info.line-two: We require at least 48 hours notice should you wish to make any changes or amendments to your scheduled appointment. Should you not inform us of any change within 48 notice you will be charged the service fee.

mail.part-one: We are unable to receive responses to this email. If you need assistance, go to
mail.part-two: sent you this email. By using our services, you agree to our customer agreement.

contact-details.info-text: We will call or message you the day before, as well as at the moment of arriving to ensure the quality of experience.

shopping-bag-container.instruction-1: This fee helps us run our operations, all services included.
shopping-bag-container.instruction-2: Amount will be blocked on your card until the day of the delivery.

environment-header.env-header-h5-subhead: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.

icon-img-text.text-h5: Over one-third of online fashion orders ends with a return, with two journeys for each: one to deliver and another to collect. This doubles the miles driven for each shop. With Emays, these delivery and return trips are combined, we cuts those miles in half by combining the delivery and return journey.

icon-text-img.text-h5: Emays delivery service is designed with the environment in mind  providing the best shopping experience for modern customers. We always strive for excellent customer service experience and take an intentional approach by reducing our environmental impact by delivering an all-inclusive store experience to your door with our zero-emission cars to make style more sustainable, for people and planet.

img-text-icon.text-h5: Emays delivers using packaging-free, hanging garments bags. This service aim to avoid the use of plastic and erase the disposable packaging.

text-img.text-h5: We partner with OneTreePlanted, and we support their projects. We plant one tree for every order that we complete, helping to clean the air that we breath, restore forests, create habitat for biodiversity, and make a positive social impact around the world.

col-1.title: WE SHIP THE SHOP
col-1.subtitle-h2: Take the luxury shopping experience to your home.
col-1.subtitle-h3: Try What you want, pay only what you keep.
col-1.btn-text: See what we can do for you

services.text-h1: Our Services are available on selected brands websites

first-block.body-text: Choose all the pieces you would like to try, we will bring them to you with no upfront payment.

second-block.body-text: Skip the process, we send back the pieces you don't want.

third-block.body-text: Shop on your schedule with times available from 9am to 9pm, 7 days a week.

fourth-block.body-text: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.

landing.title: WE SHIP THE SHOP
landing.sub-header: Bring the Luxury shopping experience to your clients
landing.description: Highly personal in-store shopping experience delivered to your client’s home to give luxury fashion a sustainable turn.

partnership.chart-info: A global consumer survey conducted by Content Square (leader in digital experience analytics) indicates that only 15% of respondents are satisfied with their online shopping experience.
